qas.question: Boston is culturally similar to what area?
What is the Boston accent known as?
Who influences Boston's politics and religion?
What are Bostons neologisms more commonly known as?
Food with an emphasis on seafood, salt, and dairy is an exaple of what?

context: Boston shares many cultural roots with <a0_0>greater New England<a0_0/>, including a dialect of the non-rhotic Eastern New England accent known as <a1_0>Boston English<a1_0/>, and a <a4_0>regional cuisine<a4_0/> with a large emphasis on seafood, salt, and dairy products. <a2_0>Irish Americans<a2_0/> are a major influence on Boston's politics and religious institutions. Boston also has its own collection of neologisms known as <a3_0>Boston slang<a3_0/>.
